about.title: About me
about.description: Certified Systems Analyst and Developer, graduated in 2020, focused on creating innovative solutions using chatbots, serverless architectures, Node.js, and AWS Lambda. My experience encompasses customer support/service, system deployment, and consulting, enabling me to deliver comprehensive, client-focused solutions.
about.passion: Outside of work, I dedicate myself to family and enjoy gaming. I'm constantly growing through reading and enhancing my technical skills in Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS, while actively improving my English proficiency. Always open to connections and discussions that foster mutual growth and innovation.

zenvia.title: Operations Developer
zenvia.description: Development of projects across multiple platforms including chatbots, helpdesk, and document dispatch systems. Key responsibilities include project publication, maintenance, platform integration through APIs and webhooks, technical documentation creation, bug fixing, and project management through JIRA.

movidesk_analyst.title: Customer Service Analyst
movidesk_analyst.description: Provided high-quality customer service with focus on technical problem resolution. Collected evidence using browser DevTools for documentation, performed API requests and testing, and conducted thorough bug analysis for the development team.

movidesk_manager.title: Implementation Success Manager
movidesk_manager.description: Led Helpdesk software implementation projects, identifying client needs and mapping workflows. Managed client onboarding pipeline and maintained follow-up communication to ensure successful implementation.

omiexperience.title: Customer Success Analyst - Implementation
omiexperience.description: Managed system implementation for clients, handling the entire onboarding process. Responsible for customer portfolio management during the onboarding phase.

londrisoft_implementation.title: Implementation Analyst
londrisoft_implementation.description: Led system implementations, conducting client requirement gathering interviews and delivering system training. Managed implementation timelines, applied system training, and coordinated internal operations to improve service quality.

londrisoft_support.title: Technical Support Analyst
londrisoft_support.description: Provided multi-channel customer support via phone, chat, and in-person visits. Managed support tickets, performed database queries for issue resolution, and handled non-fiscal printer configuration.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to reach out!
